Name: inhrelid
Description: This is the reference to the subtable, that is, it records the fact that the identified table is inherited from some other table.

Name: inhparent
Description: This is the reference to the parent table, which the table referenced by inhrelid inherited from.

Name: inhseqno
Description: If there is more than one parent for a subtable (multiple inheritance), this number tells the order in which the inherited columns are to be arranged. The count starts at 1.
